about_the_game:
Japan is beautiful this time of year

Create life again in a worn out, forgotten street. Fix your restaurant and alley and make it beautiful in your own way with your best choice of customization and decorations. 

Wander through cozy, lantern-lit alleys and add your personal touch with decorations, upgrades, and creative designs (more lanterns, right?).

Decorate for days

Roll up your sleeves, serve up mouthwatering bowls of ramen, and earn and unlock a wide array of unique decorations, customizations and recipes. Whether you prefer a quirky, bustling diner with mismatched charm or an elegant, fine dining establishment that oozes sophistication, the choice is yours.

Clean your way to the top

Clean, paint, and cook your way to the top. Hard workers have the best equipment and can afford the best ingredients. Or maybe you want to splash all the cash on 50 darumas? Just make sure to be on top of cleaning - no one enjoys a restaurant with dirty floors and a full trash can.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent, 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Recommended:

short_description: This game puts you in the shoes of a new restaurant owner. Even if the restaurant you have isn’t in the best shape to begin with, and the alley it’s located in have seen better days, we trust you to transform it to something truly special. Here is your chance to get a sneak peek of our ramen-world!
